name: +iQeI/Q-(This game is for aliens.)
description:
This game is for alians.

However, even the earthling people can play.

Can you go home from a place where words do not communicate?

Play time is about 1 hour.

(As the author is a Japanese, the translation of the Eng"r"ish part may be strange...)

Posting of play videos to the video site etc. of this game, live broadcast etc are welcome.

Controls

cursor keys:moving

Z,enter: decision

X,escape:menu,cansel

Twitter URL

https://twitter.com/polytan_Q

p.s.

Sorry, there was translation missing.(Japanese was left)...I fixed it!!
